replace-police-report.legend: Have you reported the theft to the police?

why-need-poison.label: {{values.whyNeedPoisonLabel}}
why-need-poison.hint: Detailed answers mean we can process your application faster

how-much-poison.label: How much do you wish to acquire at any one time within a 6-month period?
how-much-poison.hint: Enter the amount and the unit. For example, 10 litres
how-much-poison.summary-heading: How much do you wish to acquire at any one time within a 6-month period?

what-concentration-poison.label: What concentration % w/w of the substance do you need?
what-concentration-poison.summary-heading: What concentration % w/w of the substance do you need?

where-to-store-poison.hint: This must be in the UK

where-to-use-poison.hint: This must be in the UK

replace-countersignatory-years.label: How many years have you known your countersignatory?
replace-countersignatory-years.hint: They must have known you for at least 2 years

replace-countersignatory-howyouknow.label: How do you know your countersignatory?

replace-countersignatory-phone-number.label: Contact phone number
replace-countersignatory-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

replace-countersignatory-Id-type.legend: What is your countersignatory’s identity document?
replace-countersignatory-Id-type.hint: You only need to provide a document number.

replace-which-document-type.legend: Which identity document do you want to use?
replace-which-document-type.hint: If your licence is granted, you will need to show this document when buying the substances

replace-phone-number.label: Contact phone number
replace-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

replace-email.hint: Where we will contact you about the outcome of your application
